summary: Completed comprehensive testing of RUNETIC E-Commerce platform. All backend APIs working correctly (20/20 tests passed). Frontend admin panel and public catalog verified working.

issues: All 100 products show 'Agotado' (out of stock) with 0 stock - this is expected as no inventory entries have been added yet
Pages show 100 products but API has 254 total - pagination limit is set to 100

critical_code_review_comments: Admin pages use limit=100 which doesn't show all 254 products - consider adding pagination controls or increasing limit
All products have 0 stock - inventory entries need to be added for stock to show
WOMPI integration is configured with sandbox/test keys (pub_test_*) - will need production keys for live payments
seed_data_creation: No seed data created - using existing 254 products in database
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features verified working: Admin login, Products management (254 products with valid prices), Inventory page, WOMPI payment config endpoint, Order creation. Products have 0 stock as no inventory entries exist.

verified_features.admin_products_page: PASS - Shows 100 products with retail and wholesale prices
verified_features.admin_inventory_page: PASS - Shows 100 products with stock status (all 0 stock)
verified_features.public_catalog: PASS - Shows products with prices and images
